long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wikipedia AI Helper

Wikipedia AI Helper enhances your browsing experience on Wikipedia by offering two powerful features: article summarization and interactive Q&A based on the content. Whether you're looking to quickly grasp the key points of an article or ask specific questions about it, this tool has you covered.

Key Features:
Summarize Articles: Get concise and informative summaries of Wikipedia articles with just a click. Perfect for when you're short on time and need the essential information quickly.
Ask Questions: Interact with the article content directly by asking questions and receiving answers generated by AI. This feature allows you to dive deeper into the subject and gain a better understanding of complex topics.
This extension is designed to save time, improve your understanding, and make information retrieval from Wikipedia seamless. Ideal for students, researchers, or anyone who frequently uses Wikipedia for learning and information gathering.
